wikipedia_page.main: Mira Hamermesh (15 July 1923 - 19 February 2012) was an independent Polish filmmaker and artist who made documentaries for British television.  She was a student of painting at the Bezalel Art School in Jerusalem and later moved to London to study at the Slade School of Art.  Mira returned to Poland in 1960 to study at the polish film school where she began documenting her personal experience of fleeing Nazi occupied Germany as a Jewish teenager.
